import React from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { FaNewspaper, FaDownload, FaEnvelope, FaArrowLeft } from 'react-icons/fa'; import '../styles/Press.css'; import pressHero from '../Images/press-hero.jpg'; import logo from '../Images/logo.png'; import newsImage1 from '../Images/news1.jpg'; import newsImage2 from '../Images/news2.jpg'; import newsImage3 from '../Images/news3.jpg'; const Press = () => { const pressReleases = [ { id: 1, title: "Matrimony Connect Reaches 1 Million Successful Matches", date: "February 15, 2025", excerpt: "Matrimony Connect celebrates a major milestone, having facilitated one million successful marriages across the country.", image: newsImage1 }, { id: 2, title: "New AI-Powered Matching Algorithm Launches", date: "December 8, 2024", excerpt: "Matrimony Connect introduces an advanced AI-powered matching system to help singles find more compatible partners.", image: newsImage2 }, { id: 3, title: "Matrimony Connect Expands Services to International Markets", date: "October 20, 2024", excerpt: "Following its domestic success, Matrimony Connect announces expansion to serve the matrimonial needs of communities worldwide.", image: newsImage3 } ]; const mediaFeatures = [ { id: 1, logo: "https://via.placeholder.com/150x50", name: "Business Daily" }, { id: 2, logo: "https://via.placeholder.com/150x50", name: "Tech Insider" }, { id: 3, logo: "https://via.placeholder.com/150x50", name: "Lifestyle Magazine" }, { id: 4, logo: "https://via.placeholder.com/150x50", name: "Wedding Weekly" }, { id: 5, logo: "https://via.placeholder.com/150x50", name: "Digital Trends" }, { id: 6, logo: "https://via.placeholder.com/150x50", name: "Family Focus" } ]; return (

2022

); }; export default Press;
